shortDescription: Complete Company Contact Forms Synchronization with GEMI Fields
problem: Company contact creation modal had only 2 basic fields while ContactDetails showed extensive GEMI data with 7 rich tabs. Individual contact forms needed professional details separation. Photo updates weren't propagating correctly across views.
cause: Form modals and detail views were not synchronized. Missing comprehensive GEMI field structure in company forms. Photo state management had propagation issues.

solution.phase1: Created modular contact form architecture with separate sections for each contact type
solution.phase2: Expanded CompanyContactSection from 2 to 22 comprehensive GEMI fields organized in 4 sections
solution.phase3: Enhanced IndividualContactSection with separated professional details and communication sections
solution.phase4: Fixed photo propagation with useEffect and JSON comparison in ContactsPageContent
solution.phase5: Integrated all form sections with centralized useContactForm hook and proper TypeScript types

testing: TypeScript compilation verified. Form structure matches ContactDetails tabs. Photo upload and propagation working. All GEMI fields available in company creation modal.
notes: Next phase: Centralize GEMI field configurations for Single Source of Truth to eliminate code duplication between form creation, editing, and display components.
